name: Rite of Resurrection
title: Qiqi: Rite of Resurrection
in_play_description: When your Qiqi, who has this card equipped, uses Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Qiqi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Qiqi, equip this card.
After Qiqi equips this card, immediately use Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune once.
After your Qiqi, who has this card equipped, uses Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match)
(You must have Qiqi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
